summary: This mod will change the menu music originally played on the Skyrim menu screen.
descriptionHtml:
Song by: Yisabel
This is a Korean song played in a drama called "Gu Family Book"
---------

THIS MOD WILL NOT CHANGE THE MENU PICTURE OR BACKGROUND

---------

To rewrite the original Skyrim menu music follow these simple instructions:

1: Navigate to your Skyrim data folder
2: Create a folder inside the skyrim data folder called "Music" if one is not already there
3: Create a folder inside the Music folder called "Special"
4: Extract the file into the "Special" folder
5: Launch the game and confirm it has been changed!

---------

Sorry for the English description. I do not speak Korean! :(
There is also an English version of this song, but the traditional Korean dialect is much more interesting in my opinion.
I might add the English version, but I just wanted to share this particular song, the process for making your own menu music file is quite easy. But I would still be willing to add it if asked.
author: BenKorisian
